ARNOLD'S
WE ARE OPEN
11:00am – 2:00am
7 days a week
Last call at 1:30am
HAPPY HOUR
Monday – Friday
11:00am – 4:00pm
KITCHEN HOURS
Monday – Saturday: 11:00am to 11:00pm

11:00am to 11:00pm

11:00am to 2:00pm
